text:
iOS Engineer @ San Francisco (ONSITE) H1B Transfers OK

Backed by Google Ventures with under 50 employees, Kamcord is the world's #1 livestreaming platform for mobile gameplay. We're expanding our focus and are looking for 2 strong iOS engineers to help us scale.

If interested, please apply directly (https://jobs.lever.co/kamcord/8480c014-d88c-4d2a-8286-2b99c9...) or email vic@kamcord.com.
